title: Restore default displayed name to Ghazal

requirements.summary: Revert the initial default name shown in the header and prefilled in the editable input to “Ghazal” while preserving live updates as the user types.
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh page load, the main name header displays "Ghazal" by default.
On a fresh page load, the name input field value is "Ghazal" by default.
The user can still edit the name and the header updates live as they type.
No other app text, behaviors, or styling change as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Change the initial React state for `name` from "Hina Sadat" back to the previous default "Ghazal" (the `useState(...)` initializer), ensuring the header and controlled input both prefill with "Ghazal" on first load and continue to update live as the user types. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
